Name: Gold Rush Slammer
Ingredients: Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first 2 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.
Review: Flakes of gold dance with the champagne's bubbles.
History: Discovered in 2003 at Oxo Tower Bar, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Gold Rush Slammer contains 75 calories
